title: lmfao i got 14 day ban for a joke
body:
I said "good job gayren" 
my top laner was playing garen and he took first tower.  didn't know he would get butt hurt over that.   lmfao,  people are so sensitive nowadays.

replies.body: I swear dude I been clean.  I went to rehab, well riot put me on it.  nah, I was good.  I usually mute people to hold myself back from saying anything to these sensitive little flowers.  but I meant to say good job garen, not in a malicious way.  no harm to anyone.
show the ban logs if thats all you said
I've typed that quite a few times. no chat restrict for it.
no, I didn't get chat restrict.  straight up ban lol.  I saw chat log, that's the only thing "offensive" I said.  jeez.
